OOC:He is on the ground!!he doesn't ahve a flying mode



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> haha....they are handy tho
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > Beware, the killer dandiloins!
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > The mysterious bot woke up from his searchings...he as neiter
> > pleased
> > > nor dissapointed. He had discovered that he could transform to a
> > being
> > > of this planet...but because of the emergency state of his stasis
> > pod
> > > he had be given a form of a plant.  There were many advanteges tho
> > to
> > > this new being....He transformed into a plant and decided to test
> > his
> > > abilities...First he tried his defense...With a single thought he
> > grew
> > > to an enormous tree..Planted hard in the ground unable to move
> > "Great"
> > > he thought. I am a frikkin tree.  He shrunk back down to a small
> > > plant...He could control his roots through the ground and he sped
> > them
> > > through the ground 200 m in all directions and then they
> > > stopped....not a bad limit....he then popped into the ground leaving
> > a
> > > small hole and instantaneously grew 200 m away from the ends of one
> > of
> > > his roots....He then agian shot his roots back to where he had come
> > > from and went back....He transformed to a bot. "I should set some
> > > defence up and find out about this planet. He walked around in a
> > > perimeter around his dead pod sticking his finger in the ground
> > three
> > > times every ten meters. Where his finger had gone in grew 1: a weed
> > 2:
> > > a rose adn 3 : a dandilion.....that should be good enough he
> > thought.
> > > He went back to the pod and startd ripping it apart.
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > The new bot came too as he realised that he had landed on a new
> > > > planet. As soon as his optics logged on he saw the statis pod
> > drop.
> > > > The emergency beacon slowly dimmed lighter and lighter. "Shit..."
> > he
> > > > said looking at his pod...."All my equipment is ruined." He got up
> > and
> > > > looked at himself. He was about 5 feet tall and not very large at
> > all.
> > > > But he could feel he had incridble speed. He reached to his side
> > and
> > > > grabbed two tubes from his hips. He held them both in his hands
> > and
> > > > once a firm grip was on thim Energy Whips formed from the
> > end..."Well
> > > > I like this...." He then closed his optics off and entered his
> > > > brain...he searched for all his new abilites.....
